meanings.definition: A software designed to detect and remove computer viruses.
meanings.sent1: I installed antivirus on my computer to keep it safe from viruses.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to update your antivirus regularly to protect your device.
meanings.sent3: The antivirus on my laptop works like a digital shield against harmful bugs.
meanings.sent4: Her antivirus acted like a vigilant guardian, swiftly eliminating any threats.
meanings.sent5: The antivirus software was like a superhero defending my computer from evil viruses.

meanings.definition: A substance that inhibits the growth or destroys viruses.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use antivirus medications to fight off harmful viruses in patients.
meanings.sent2: The antivirus in the vaccine helped prevent the spread of the flu.
meanings.sent3: The antivirus in the hand sanitizer kept germs at bay, like a tiny warrior.
meanings.sent4: Herbal teas can act as a natural antivirus, boosting the immune system.
meanings.sent5: The antivirus properties of garlic have been known for centuries in traditional medicine.
